name: Unstoppable Knight Genesis
description:
A Sega Genesis/Mega Drive version of my Game Boy game, made just for fun.

You play as a knight that will try to collect all the coins in the forest not matter what while avoinding the enemies and obstacles in his way.

Controls

Left/Right Button - for Left & Right movement

B button - Shield

START button - Pause the game

Tested on emulators: Gens, Blastem, Genesis Plus Gx
